sentences.en: a visit to Lyon, Birmingham's twin town in France
sentences.cn: 对伯明翰在法国的友好城市里昂的访问

sentences.en: Both the twin brothers were born and bred in London.
sentences.cn: 这对双胞胎兄弟是在伦敦长大的.

sentences.en: Can you tell her from her twin sister?
sentences.cn: 你能将她和她的孪生姐妹分开 吗 ?

sentences.en: Edgar cast a disdainful look at his twin.
sentences.cn: 埃德加朝他的双胞胎兄弟投去鄙夷的目光。

sentences.en: I always confounded him with his twin brother.
sentences.cn: 我总分不清他和他的孪生兄弟。

sentences.en: It is hard to distinguish him from his twin brother.
sentences.cn: 很难辨认出他和他的孪生兄弟。

sentences.en: Meet my twin sister.
sentences.cn: 见见我的双胞胎姐姐。

sentences.en: She is often mistaken for her twin sister.
sentences.cn: 她常被人当作是她的孪生姐妹.

sentences.en: Shorthand and typewriting have been described as the twin arts.
sentences.cn: 速记和打字被说成是一对孪生技巧.

sentences.en: The plane is an eight-seater with twin propellers.
sentences.cn: 这架飞机有8个座位，靠双螺旋桨推进。

sentences.en: The small mote on her forehead distinguishes her from her twin sister.
sentences.cn: 她额头上的这个小斑点是她与其双胞胎妹妹的区别.

sentences.en: The twin brothers are alike in appearance but differ greatly in disposition.
sentences.cn: 这对孪生兄弟外貌很相像,但性格却相差很大.

sentences.en: The twin brothers are as like as two peas.
sentences.cn: 那两个兄弟毫无二致.

sentences.en: The twin brothers bled for their country and died without any regrets.
sentences.cn: 这对孪生兄弟为国流血牺牲,死而无憾.

sentences.en: The twin brothers were removed from our class.
sentences.cn: 这一对孪生兄弟已从我们班转走。

sentences.en: the twin problems of poverty and unemployment
sentences.cn: 贫穷和失业这对孪生问题

sentences.en: The twins are now eight months old.
sentences.cn: 这对双胞胎现在已经八个月大了。

sentences.en: There are twin holes on each side of the instrument.
sentences.cn: 这工具的两边各有一对孔眼.

sentences.en: This led Zagreb's twin town, Mainz, to donate £70,000-worth of high-quality equipment.
sentences.cn: 这使得萨格勒布的友好城市美因茨捐赠了价值7万英镑的高品质装备。

sentences.en: Would you prefer twin beds or a double?
sentences.cn: 你们喜欢一对单人床还是一张双人床？

sentences.en: You're always mixing me up with my twin brother.
sentences.cn: 你老是分辨不出我和我的双胞胎弟弟.

words.tran_cn: 一胎双生的；成双成对的
两个的,成对的,二重的,二倍的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 同卵双生，全等双生
双螺旋桨；双推进器；双驱动桥

trans.tran_cn: 成对的，成双的，双重的，双联的
trans.tran_en: used to describe one of two children who are twins

trans.tran_cn: 孪生儿之一，双胞胎之一，两个相像的人或物之一，孪晶，双人床
trans.tran_en: one of two children born at the same time to the same mother

trans.tran_cn: 尤用于英国)使结成姊妹城市，使（两人或两事物）紧密结合，使偶合，使相连
